resources.string: Click to turn off Smart Controller
Click to turn on Smart Controller
Select the time delaing before turning off mobile data

Smart Mobile Data Controller is an app used for control the mobile data automatically when the screen on and off. It can help you to save battery and not affect you for access the network. This is the first version of the app, I will try to add more smart function in the next versions.

The app is open source and free for using, so it contains an AD banner. If you don\'t want to see the AD banner or you want to see the source code, you can access https://github.com/lsyiverson/SmartMobileDataController to get the source code and modify it by yourself.

Thank you for using this app!
Turn on Smart Mobile Data Controller will lead other mobile data switch invalid, the mobile data will be automatically controlling by this app. Do you want to continue?
